creator: theodor.rausch@softtek.com
text:
When I enter a variable and then change the screen to another element in the 
test plan and after this, I go back to the variable screen the variable is 
reseted to the initial value.
The problem can be fixed if I press "add variable". After these I have to 
delete the variable, because it doesn't make sense.

Does the problem go away if you Tab out of the field, or if you select another
field on the scren before selecting a different screen?
creator: sebb@apache.org
theodor.rausch@softtek.com
text:
The problem goes away if I tab to another field on the screen.
However, it doesnt go away when selecting (with the mouse) another element on 
the screen before changing.

creator: theodor.rausch@softtek.com
text:
I supose it has something to do with an listener in swing, for example 
the "wrong" listener is used.
